# Welcome

Welcome to my Weekly Study Diary!  
This book chronicles my learning journey in the fields of remote sensing and Geographic Information Systems (GIS), featuring weekly theoretical summaries, practical applications, and personal reflections.

Please use the navigation sidebar or the links below to explore the chapters and learn more about each week's content. If you are interested in a specific topic, feel free to click on the corresponding diary entry.


## About this Book

This book compiles my weekly learning diaries where I explore remote sensing, image classification, and other related topics.
